title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys
name: Some shortcuts
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/control":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/control","caption":"Settings","key":"((control))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
  <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel" $scroll="yes"/>
</$navigator>
"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"⌨️ Jump to Setting

"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/get-plugins","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"⌨️ Jump to get-plugins
"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/help":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/help","revision":"0","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"⌨️ neotw-help

"},"$:/config/shortcuts/control":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/control","created":"20220920091946920","modified":"20220920091946920","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-I"},"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"alt-F"},"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-g"},"$:/config/shortcuts/help":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/help","created":"20220913005553888","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"alt-H"},"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-h"},"$:/config/shortcuts/newword":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/newword","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"alt-W"},"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-k"},"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet","created":"20220920091946921","modified":"20220920091946921","revision":"0","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"alt-S"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/fullscreen","key":"((fullscreen))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-full-screen"/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/get-plugins","caption":"search-filter","key":"((get-plugins))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
  <$action-navigate $to="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins" $scroll="yes"/>
</$navigator>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/help":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/help","key":"((help))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list"/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/home-page":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/home-page","code-body":"yes","key":"((home-page))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-all-tiddlers"/>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-home"/>
</$navigator>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list","created":"20220913005710777","modified":"20220920091946922","revision":"0","subtitle":"neotw keyboard list","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts}}"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/newword":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/newword","code-body":"yes","key":"((newword))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" text='<<<
"""

"""
<<<' tags="EnglishWord"/>

</$navigator>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme","revision":"0","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Customized shortcuts with `⌨️` at the beginning of description in [[shortcuts|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]] or press <kbd>alt h</kbd>

!! TODO

* add tip for repeat press this shortcut
* can't scroll to determined tiddler repreat
* another usage is if your tiddlywiki get bad, you can't find any buttons because of install some stanger plugins(even enable safemode), now you can press <kbd>ctrl I</kbd> to call setting
* add system image for tips use class
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter","caption":"search-filter","key":"((search-filter))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
  <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch" $scroll="yes"/>
</$navigator>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet","caption":"snippet","key":"((snippet))","revision":"0","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-new-tiddler" title="neotw/snippet/"
	tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet"
	caption={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Title}}
	text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Text}}
/>
</$navigator>
"}}}
